title: Hotkey for minimap focus
body:
I want to change mouse button 5 to move camera to that area on minimap but not move my character. Can I do this in game or in the input file? What is the setting called?


[HUDEvents]
evtOnUIMouse1=[Button 5]

replies.body:
These functions are reserved bindings, so it's not client supported currently.  I don't recommend modifying your game files, but if you do hang on to these config reset instructions in case you run into problems:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
